name: X-MiGuFighters: Stripper Anya 2
detailed_description:
WARNING: NSFW
Video and screen shots censored for marketing, game shows regular nudity.

X-MiGu Fighters takes us back to the world of Stripper Anya! 5 years have passed since Anya's clash with Demoniqa. What was a group of high profile Strippers working for the Triple T is now a group of fierce fighters engaging in the RenMiGu Tournaments. Our top heavy hero, Anya, competes in the company of her co-dancers Ghost, Lynchu and Esstraya as well as others from new and old alien worlds. Anya is also joined by Magnus, who is the Guild member that was instrumental in connecting Earth with life from beyond. Take part in each of the 14 character's individual journeys and play through the cohesive story told over 6 seasons of fighting!

X-MiGu Fighters offers a Story Mode, 1 Player vs CPU Free Play Mode, 2 Player VS Mode & Tutorial.

X-MiGu Fighters: marks X-MiGuPLAY's 2nd PC title which honors the late 90's/2000's arcade fighting game craze. This is a retro inspired 1 on 1 fighting game.


If you are not familiar with our company, we released our first PC title in 2017: "STRIPPER ANYA: DEMON SLAYER"
http://store.steampowered.com/app/671630/STRIPPER_ANYA_DEMON_SLAYER/

short_description: Warning - Game is NSFW & is NOT appropriate for kids, this game contains excessive nudity. X-MiGuFIGHTERs is a retro inspired 1v1 fighting game that should be approached lightheartedly.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 1 GB dedicated Video Memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please do not attempt to run this game on an integrated graphics, this includes INTEL HD. Advise at least 1GB VRAM: Be sure GPU is running at high performance and ensure vendor software is running in real-time to ensure best performance in order to get the best game-play experience. X-MiGuPLAY advises monitoring FPS to confirm if system is running at or close to 60 FPS. For more information, click here: http://steamcommunity.com/app/705700/discussions/0/1692662302104279344/
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: i3 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 750 equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Be sure GPU is running at high performance and ensure vendor software is running in real-time to ensure best performance in order to get the best game-play experience. X-MiGuPLAY advises monitoring FPS to confirm if system is running at or close to 60 FPS.
